main event: An Air Force pilot reported seeing three large flashing lights over Mastic Apt, Long Island on 17 July 1956.
interesting points: The objects were observed for about 5-10 seconds., The lights moved rapidly at a high altitude., One of the lights was triangular shaped and green in color with strong white flashes., The reporting office suggested the sighting may have been caused by flares., The sighting involved three rather large objects.
